query_1.text: Who was George Washington and what roles did he play in the founding of the United States?

query_2.text: What significant accomplishments did George Washington achieve during his presidency?

query_3.text: When did George Washington become the first President of the United States, and how long did he serve in that role?

query_4.text: Where was George Washington born, and how did his early life influence his leadership?

query_5.text: Why is George Washington often referred to as the "Father of His Country"?

query_6.text: How did George Washington's military strategies contribute to the success of the American Revolutionary War?
